item.title: Using the Open Policy Agent CLI
item.description: Getting Started with Envoy & Open Policy Agent — 04 — Using the Open Policy Agent Command Line Interface This is the 4th Envory & Open Policy Agent Getting Started Guide. Each guide is intended to explore a single feature and walk through a simple implementation. Each guide builds on the concepts explored in the previous guide with the end goal of building a very powerful authorization service by the end of the series.
